# Welcome to my website

I am a theoretical computational physicist in the field of High Energy Physics.
In my work I use computers to provide high-precision quantitative predictions of physical quantities, in those regimes where analytic solutions are out of reach.

- **Current employer**: [University of Bern](https://www.itp.unibe.ch/about_us/people/people/index_eng.html?id=265)
- **Job title**: Postdoctoral Researcher
- **Education**: PhD in Theoretical Physics


My main areas of interest are: 

- Quantum Field Theories on the **lattice**, **QCD** phenomenology
- **Machine Learning** for scientific applications, Physics-Informed Neural Networks
- **Markov chain Monte Carlo**, Bayesian algorithms

[Education](./education.qmd) | [Experience](./experience.qmd) | [Publications](./publications.qmd) | [Teaching](teaching.qmd) | [Software](./software_libs.qmd)
